metadata.name: Salatul Layl - Dua to begin qunoot

arabic: لآ اِلٰهَ اِلَّا اللَّهُ الْحَلِيْمُ الْكَرِيْمُ
لآ اِلٰهَ اِلَّا اللَّهُ الْعَلِيُّ الْعَظِيْمُ
وَ مَا فِيْهِنَّ وَ مَا بَيْنَهُنَّ
وَ مَا فَوْقَهُنَّ وَ مَا تَحْتَهُنَّ
وَ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِهِ الطَّاهِرِيْنَ
translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent the merciful
There is no god except Allah the Forbearing, the Generous
There is no god except Allah the High the Almighty
Glory be to Allah Lord of the seven heavens
and Lord of the seven earths
and whatever is in them, and between them
and above them and below them,
All praise is for Allah Lord of the worlds.
O Allah bless Muhammad and his pure family.
transliteration: wa mā fīhinna wa mā baynahunn
wa mā fawqahunna wa mā taḥtahunn
